pxchat.net.protocol.core
Interface ServerFrameAdapterListener

public interface ServerFrameAdapterListener

This interface contains the callbacks used by the ServerFrameAdapter.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Method Summary

Method Detail

createAdapter

void createAdapter(ServerFrameAdapter serverAdapter,
                   AuthFrameAdapter adapter)
This method is called whenever the server adapter creates a new frame adapter.

Parameters:
serverAdapter - The source of the event
adapter - The newly created frame adapter

destroyAdapter

void destroyAdapter(ServerFrameAdapter serverAdapter,
                    AuthFrameAdapter adapter)
This method is called whenever the server adapter destroys a frame adapter.

Parameters:
serverAdapter - The source of the event
adapter - The adapter that will be destroyed
